attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Sunday Telegraph of 3 Feb 08 reported on an inter-Governmental review which recently concluded that income support can be paid to the wives of polygamists who married abroad and now reside in the UK. 

This decision not only flouts UK law but sets a precedent which undermines cohesion within our society and could lead to a significant drain on already hard-pressed public finances.

I petition the Prime Minister to reverse this decision.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a call for action, not a name.

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Polygamywelfare/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
